articles.description: Dating back to the first day of the ACC tournament, the Wolfpack have won seven consecutive elimination games.
articles.content: PITTSBURGH When the latest heroics were over, after DJ Burns Jr. salted away an unthinkable seventh postseason victory in 12 days, burnishing his and NC States growing legend, the Wolfpacks nimble gi… [+5285 chars]
